title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Advanced Networking: Simulation Training Based on Packet Tracer

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design actual network topologies using Packet Tracer and execute simulations.
Learners can analyze and implement application scenarios for various routing protocols (e.g., OSPF, EIGRP).
Learners possess the ability to document packet tracing and troubleshooting procedures when network failures occur.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
